content: have you ever been in an airport so you know how hard it can be to identify your luggage when it s on the conveyor belt/baggage carousel it seems that all the luggages look alike here is a very beautiful pattern to help you out the yarn we use for our project is the impeccable loops & threads worsted weight yarn medium 4 100% acrylic we use two different color yarns the color yarns are eggplant and petunia the finished measurement of our luggage i d is approximately 15 long the luggage tag/i d is created using 4 different crochet pieces sewn together if you need help with this pattern check out my tutorial https //youtu be/wc0iqtxul_8
